longBusinessSummary: Motus Holdings Limited operates in the automotive sector in South Africa, the United Kingdom, Australia, South East Asia, and Southern and East Africa. It operates through four segments: Import and Distribution, Retail and Rental, Motor-Related Financial Services, and Aftermarket Parts. The Import and Distribution segment imports and distributes passenger and light commercial vehicles and parts to a network of dealerships, car rental companies, fleets, and government institutions in South Africa. The Retail and Rental segment sells passenger and commercial vehicles in various segments. It has 77 pre-owned dealerships, 226 passenger vehicle dealerships, and 18 commercial vehicle dealerships in South Africa; 90 commercial dealerships and 29 passenger dealerships in the United Kingdom; and 28 passenger vehicle dealerships in Australia. This segment also rents cars under the Europcar and Tempest brands; and sells used cars under the Auto Pedigree brand. The Motor-Related Financial Services segment develops and distributes various vehicle related financial products and services through importers and distributors, dealers, vehicle finance houses, call centers, and digital channels. It manages and administers service, maintenance, and warranty plans; and develops and sells value added products and services. This segment also provides fleet management services to corporate customers. The Aftermarket Parts segment distributes, sells, and retails accessories and aftermarket parts for out-of-warranty vehicles through owned branches, retail stores, a network of franchised outlets, and specialised workshops. It operates 797 retail stores, including 72 owned stores in Southern Africa and South East Asia. The company is also involved in the property investment activities. Motus Holdings Limited was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Bedfordview, South Africa.
address2: Corner Geldenhuis Road and Van Dort Street
